description:
Katori is the spiritual pilot/navigator the http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze]. A great lover of Japanese green tea - if he has a cup, he can be counted on to perform the most difficult maneuvers (like steering through an asteroid belt) without breaking a sweat.
While he appears to be a Westerner, he is actually of Japanese descent. Possessed of a self-confidence that borders on arrogance, he claims that the ship is as "safe as a cradle" when he`s at the helm. His hobbies include various types of meditation, including Zen meditation.
name: Harold Katori
